A Road Less Travelled By
Palanga Concert Hall, Klaipeda County, Lithuania Canceled due to the Corona Virus Pandemic. Statement from EBBA: https://www.ebba.eu.com/news?article=ebbc-2020-cancelled
Palanga could probably host the EBBC in 2024 or 2025. That depends on Gateshead which is planning to be the first English Host since 2007 (almost 20 Years later!).
Oct. 12, 2018, 7:21 p.m. June 13, 2020, 5:37 p.m.
